app.long-description: This app is intended for people with PKU. It combines a calculator, pencil, paper and nutritional table.
app.auth-error: Unfortunately this did not work. Try it again. Always use the same login method.
app.limit: Entries limit reached. Support with a subscription for unlimited entries. See settings for more.

home.title: Home
home.description: Nutrition app for low-phenylalanine diets. This app is intended for people with PKU. It combines a calculator, pencil, paper and nutritional table.
home.signin-desc: Easily sign in on any device. Data syncs in real time.
home.install-desc: Can be installed on any device (Android, iOS, Mac, Windows).
home.about-description: From the developer of one of the first PKU apps for Android "Phe Rechner", as well as "PKU Manager". Development of PKU apps since 2013.

food-search.title: Food Search
food-search.search-info: Refine your search with several words, e.g. "apples raw" or "potatoes cooked". Use the Barcode Scanner for products. Source: fdc.nal.usda.gov

phe-calculator.title: Phe Calculator
phe-calculator.description: Calculate the amount of Phe for a specific weight or convert protein to Phe.

barcode-scanner.title: Barcode Scanner
barcode-scanner.info: Phe gets calculated from protein. Source: openfoodfacts.org
barcode-scanner.error: Something went wrong. If the error occurs again, try restarting the app.
barcode-scanner.error-camera-permission: Camera access denied. Check the camera permission for your browser (Web) or the "Site Settings" by long pressing the app icon (Android).
barcode-scanner.error-no-camera: No camera found on this device.
barcode-scanner.error-not-supported: Camera not supported. A secure connection (HTTPS or localhost) is required.
barcode-scanner.error-not-readable: Camera cannot be used. Is it already active in another app?
barcode-scanner.error-overconstrained: No suitable camera found. Check your camera settings.
barcode-scanner.error-stream-api: Stream API is not supported in this browser.
barcode-scanner.error-insecure-context: Camera access is only permitted in a secure context. Use HTTPS or localhost.

own-food.title: Own Food
own-food.description: Save your own foods for quick addition.
own-food.search-info: Own food is also available in the search.

diary.title: Diary
diary.description: Keep track of your food and monitor your Phe tolerance.
diary.info: Use the tools in the navigation bar to add food.

diet-report.title: Diet Report
diet-report.description: Keep track of your food and monitor your Phe tolerance.
diet-report.chart-info: The chart gets displayed after the second entry.

blood-values.title: Blood Values
blood-values.description: Track blood values in a diagram.
blood-values.chart-info: The chart gets displayed after the second entry.
blood-values.unit-info: Unit can be changed in the settings.

settings.title: Settings
settings.change-password-info: Please use the "Forgot Password" function under "Sign in with Email".
settings.delete-account-info: Only works if the last login was not too long ago. Please log out once and log in again.
settings.delete-account-error: Unfortunately this did not work. Try logging out and back in again.
settings.tier-unlimited-desc: Support monthly and get access to all features.

sign-in.title: Sign in
sign-in.name: Name
sign-in.reset-note: Receive an email to reset the password.
sign-in.password-sent: Email for password reset has been sent. Please check your emails.

help.title: Help
help.install-p1: This web app can be installed on any device like an app.
help.install-p3: In Safari, tap the share button and then "Add to Home Screen".
help.install-p4: Click the little installation icon in the address bar in Chrome, Brave or Edge.

features.calculator-description: Calculate the amount of Phe for a specific weight or convert protein to Phe.
features.own-food-description: Save your own foods for quick addition.
features.diary-description: Keep track of your food and monitor your Phe tolerance.
features.blood-values-description: Track blood values in a diagram.
features.suggestions-description: Add suggestions to the diary with one click.
features.assistant-description: Get an overview, recommendations and motivation.

assistant.title: Assistant
assistant.description: Get an overview, recommendations and motivation.
assistant.satiety-tip-high: Consider foods with less Phe for satiety. Your Phe intake ({phePercentage}%) is higher than your calorie intake ({kcalPercentage}%).
assistant.satiety-tip-low: You could include foods with slightly more Phe within your limits. Your Phe intake ({phePercentage}%) is lower than your calorie intake ({kcalPercentage}%).
assistant.satiety-tip-good: Great! Your Phe to calorie ratio is well balanced today.
assistant.previous-day-low: Yesterday's Phe intake was quite low. Consider including more Phe-containing foods today.
assistant.previous-day-high: You exceeded your Phe goal yesterday. Try to include fewer Phe-containing foods today.
assistant.previous-day-good: You maintained a good Phe intake yesterday. Keep it up!
assistant.blood-values-high: Your last Phe value of {phe} {unit} is above the target range. Try to strictly adhere to your Phe limits in the coming days.
assistant.blood-values-low: Your last Phe value of {phe} {unit} is below the target range. Talk to your doctor about potentially including more Phe in your diet.
assistant.blood-values-good: Your last Phe value of {phe} {unit} is in the good range. Keep it up!
assistant.blood-values-tyrosine-low: Your last Tyrosine value of {tyrosine} {unit} is low. Make sure to take your amino acid mixture regularly.
assistant.blood-values-tyrosine-high: Your last Tyrosine value of {tyrosine} {unit} is elevated. Discuss the dosage of your amino acid mixture with your doctor.
assistant.blood-values-tyrosine-good: Your last Tyrosine value of {tyrosine} {unit} is in the good range.
assistant.streak: Amazing! You've tracked your nutrition for {streak} days in a row!
assistant.week: That's a whole week of commitment!
assistant.start-tracking: Start tracking your nutrition daily to build a streak and get personalized insights!
assistant.phe-stats-average: In the last 14 days (excluding today), your average Phe intake was {average} mg.
assistant.phe-stats-deviation: The average deviation from optimum is {deviation}%.

badges.streak-description: Currently {days} of 5 days in a row
badges.history-description: {days} of 10 days in the last 2 weeks

cookie-consent.message: We use cookies for essential functions and to improve the app. Accept cookies?
